Returns.description: Version information of the OmniPath service.

get_about.Docstring:
Get information about the OmniPath service version.

Returns:
--------
str
    Version information of the OmniPath service.

Returns.description: HTML content of the OmniPath API page.

get_info.Docstring:
Return the HTML representation of the OmniPath API documentation.

Returns:
--------
str
    HTML content of the OmniPath API page.

Parameters.name: query
Parameters.description: A valid UniProt identifier (e.g., 'P00533'), a list of identifiers, or a comma-separated string. Set to an empty string to download the entire database.

Parameters.name: frmt
Parameters.description: Format of the output; 'json' returns a dictionary, 'tsv' returns a TSV table. Defaults to 'json'. Note, there is an issue using 'tsv' currently, so only use 'json'.

Parameters.name: fields
Parameters.description: Additional fields to include in the output (e.g., 'sources', 'references'). Defaults to an empty list.

Returns.description: A dictionary of interactions if format is 'json', or a TSV-formatted string if format is 'tsv'.

get_interactions.Docstring:
Fetch interaction data for provided protein identifiers.

Parameters:
-----------
query : str or list, optional
    A valid UniProt identifier (e.g., 'P00533'), a list of identifiers, or a comma-separated string. Set to an empty string to download the entire database.
frmt : str, optional
    Format of the output; 'json' returns a dictionary, 'tsv' returns a TSV table. Defaults to 'json'.
fields : str or list, optional
    Additional fields to include in the output (e.g., 'sources', 'references'). Defaults to an empty list.

Returns:
--------
dict or str
    A dictionary of interactions if format is 'json', or a TSV-formatted string if format is 'tsv'.

Examples:
---------
>>> o.get_interactions('P00533')
>>> o.get_interactions(['P00533','O15117'], fields='sources')
>>> o.get_interactions('', frmt='tsv')

Parameters.name: frmt
Parameters.description: Format of the response; 'json' returns a dictionary, 'tsv' returns a TSV-formatted string. Defaults to 'json'. Note, there is an issue using 'tsv' currently, so only use 'json'.

Returns.description: A dictionary of network statistics if format is 'json', or a TSV-formatted string if format is 'tsv'.

get_network.Docstring:
Get basic statistics about the whole network including sources.

Parameters:
-----------
frmt : str, optional
    Format of the response; 'json' returns a dictionary, 'tsv' returns a TSV-formatted string. Defaults to 'json'.

Returns:
--------
dict or str
    A dictionary of network statistics if format is 'json', or a TSV-formatted string if format is 'tsv'.

Examples:
---------
>>> o.get_network()
>>> o.get_network(frmt='tsv')

Parameters.name: query
Parameters.description: A valid UniProt identifier (e.g., 'P00533'), a list of identifiers, or a comma-separated string. Set to an empty string to download the entire database.

Parameters.name: ptm_type
Parameters.description: Restrict the output to this type of PTM (e.g., 'phosphorylation'). Defaults to None.

Parameters.name: frmt
Parameters.description: Format of the output; 'json' returns a dictionary, 'tsv' returns a TSV-formatted string. Defaults to 'json'. Note, there is an issue using 'tsv' currently, so only use 'json'.

Parameters.name: fields
Parameters.description: Additional fields to include in the output (e.g., 'sources', 'references'). Defaults to an empty list.

Returns.description: A dictionary of PTM data if format is 'json', or a TSV-formatted string if format is 'tsv'.

get_ptms.Docstring:
List enzymes, substrates, and post-translational modifications (PTMs).

Parameters:
-----------
query : str or list, optional
    A valid UniProt identifier (e.g., 'P00533'), a list of identifiers, or a comma-separated string. Set to an empty string to download the entire database.
ptm_type : str, optional
    Restrict the output to this type of PTM (e.g., 'phosphorylation'). Defaults to None.
frmt : str, optional
    Format of the output; 'json' returns a dictionary, 'tsv' returns a TSV-formatted string. Defaults to 'json'.
fields : str or list, optional
    Additional fields to include in the output (e.g., 'sources', 'references'). Defaults to an empty list.

Returns:
--------
dict or str
    A dictionary of PTM data if format is 'json', or a TSV-formatted string if format is 'tsv'.

Examples:
---------
>>> o.get_ptms(query='P00533', ptm_type='phosphorylation')
>>> o.get_ptms(query=['P00533','O15117'], fields=['sources'])
>>> o.get_ptms(frmt='tsv')

Parameters.name: frmt
Parameters.description: Format of the response; 'json' returns a dictionary, 'tsv' returns a TSV-formatted string. Defaults to 'json'. Note, there is an issue using 'tsv' currently, so only use 'json'.

Returns.description: A dictionary of resource statistics if format is 'json', or a TSV-formatted string if format is 'tsv'.

get_resources.Docstring:
Return statistics about the databases and their contents.

Parameters:
-----------
frmt : str, optional
    Format of the response; 'json' returns a dictionary, 'tsv' returns a TSV-formatted string. Defaults to 'json'.

Returns:
--------
dict or str
    A dictionary of resource statistics if format is 'json', or a TSV-formatted string if format is 'tsv'.

Examples:
---------
>>> o.get_resources()
>>> o.get_resources(frmt='tsv')
